thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Joel Kristanta
thread.title_full: Nelson Alexander reviewed by Joel Kristanta

author: Joel Kristanta
title: Joel Kristanta
text:
Brittany manages my rental property and provides a comprehensive and professional level of service. All matters are attended to promptly and follow up of ongoing issues is always done with minimal delays.
As a landlord communication with your property manager is paramount which is one of Brittany's strengths. I have confidence at all times that she is across all matters and that problems are addressed appropriately.
Great level of service and I would recommend Brittany and Nelson Alexander as a property manager.
